content: Do we ever mark unstable features for relnotes? https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/80310 is something a lot of folks have been waiting for, but it's also behind a feature flag. But the folks who have been waiting for it have many reasons to not use stable anyway, so for them at least the flag isn't a big deal, so the fact that it's available now is still super notable.
Not really, I don’t know if anyone’s checking the relnotes tag, no real harm either though. In my experience people usually just post a link to the PR on Reddit or Discourse.
